meanings.definition: A person or thing that fits
meanings.sent1: The fitter helped me find the right size shoes.
meanings.sent2: The fitter made sure the puzzle pieces matched perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The fitter at the store tried to fit a square peg into a round hole!
meanings.sent4: She was a fitter of words, always finding the perfect fit for each sentence.
meanings.sent5: The fitter's job was to ensure everything fit like a glove.

meanings.definition: Someone who installs or repairs machinery
meanings.sent1: The fitter fixed the broken machine in no time.
meanings.sent2: The factory hired a new fitter to maintain the equipment.
meanings.sent3: The fitter joked that he could fix anything except his own car!
meanings.sent4: He was a fitter of gears, making sure each one meshed perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The fitter's hands moved swiftly, like a well-oiled machine.

meanings.definition: A person who is physically fit and healthy
meanings.sent1: The fitter enjoyed jogging every morning to stay healthy.
meanings.sent2: She was the fitter of the group, always leading the way in fitness challenges.
meanings.sent3: The fitter proudly displayed their muscles at the gym.
meanings.sent4: He was a fitter of diets, always choosing nutritious foods.
meanings.sent5: The fitter's energy was contagious, inspiring others to stay active.
